questions.title: Authentication
questions.question: Does this change involve modifications to authentication, authorization, or user permission logic?

questions.title: Schema
questions.question: Does this change introduce new, or alter existing, database schemas, tables, or columns?

questions.title: Performance
questions.question: Does this change add database queries with missing indexes, N+1 queries, or queries over large datasets without pagination?

questions.title: Dependencies
questions.question: Does this change involve a major version upgrade of a core dependency? Does this change involve external dependencies update?
Does this change involve modifications to internal libraries or shared components? Are they used frequently across the repository?
Does this change activate a feature flag that exposes a significant new feature to users?
Does this change lack a documented, tested rollback plan?
Does this change introduce changes to an API used by other services that make it not forwards compatible?
Are there new linting suppressions, TODO comments, or deprecated API usage?
Is this change yet to be deployed to a development environment for testing?
